title: Grape Vines in the Wind, two of two
marks:
Inscription, Mark, and Seals

[ 錦水逸士王瑾寫 ]
description: large grape leaves with two clusters of grapes and a curling tendril at UL; larger grape vine extends from upper center down R edge, filling out towards bottom center; cluster of large grape leaves and a bunch of grapes at R center; tendril winding down towards LR; inscription LR edge
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
